content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position -13.5, 20.0), and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5).

### Copper plate factory at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position -21.5, 25.5) and inserter that puts into the assembling machine.
- Connected to electricity but currently has no power due to missing connections.

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -18.0, -49.0) and a furnace (position -18.0, -49.0).

### Furnace at position(5.0, -73.0)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position 5.0, -73.0) that is currently full output with coal as fuel.

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of:
- Lab (position -17.5, 23.5) that is currently not researching due to no research in progress.

### Pipe groups
Consists of multiple pipe groups that connect various entities for fluid transport.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to power supply
- Ensure all machines are properly connected to a power source. The assembling machine at position (-21.5, 25.5) is currently not receiving electricity.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to missing resources
- Check the ingredients required for crafting in the assembling machine. The assembling machine at position (-21.5, 25.5) is unable to create automation-science-pack due to missing resources: copper-plate and iron-gear-wheel.
